info.name: Garratt's Favorite FurAffinity
info.description: A FurAffinity style by Cooped. Updated on 2014.08.13 for Chrome Users. I sorta borked yalls install. Read the release notes for details. Cooped's OC on FA is Garratt. Inspired by his character, this Black Slime theme brings Garratt's stark contrast to life, while trying to maintain usability with subtle nuances in presentation. Activation instructions in release notes. FA FurAffinity Black Slime White Red Cooped Garratt
